title: Ticket #2873: Document new arguments syntax in manual
description:
"Job ClassAd Attributes" in "Appendix A: ClassAd Attributes" documents Args, but not the new Arguments. Furthermore, given that the two are subtly different, we should flesh out the description.

Args: String representing the arguments passed to the job. This is used when the "old syntax" for "arguments" is used in the submit file. The string is space separated. Backslashes escaping double quotation marks are no longer present.

Arguments: String representing the arguments passed to the job. This is used when the "new syntax" for "arguments" is used in the submit file. The string is formatted and escaped using the same rules as the new syntax in the submit file, although the exact representation may change to a different but equivalent one. For example "1 '2 2' 3" might become "1 2' '2 3".
